text_block_list.text:
——Funabashi Racecourse. I met Furioso for the first time 
on the day that became known as the 『Crimson Tragedy』

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
The G2 『Diolite Kinen』…… 
She'll win for sure! Definitely!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
The Uma Musume from Central are strong……but Funabashi 
won't lose either! One of our Aces is in. If it's our 
hometown where she's used to running……!
And then——the result.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
And she crosses the goal at 『Diolite Kinen』! 
First place is——

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
From Central, 『Crimson Nova』! The following four places 
were all taken by Uma Musume from Central!! And——

text_block_list.name: Funabashi Ace Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Kuu, ugh……

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
The Funabashi Uma Musume comes in 5th! And then 
the rest of the Uma Musume from other regions. 
Shockingly, the difference between 1st and 5th——

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Is 3.3 seconds! It's 3.3 seconds! 
They were left so far behind.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: No way…… No……

I could only stare in disbelief…… 
As a trainer from the local Funabashi Tracen Academy.

What everyone in Funabashi, Uma Musume and Trainers alike, 
saw could only be called the "Crimson Nightmare".

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
(2400m on dirt……and by 3.3 seconds…… 
It has to be a lie…… There's no way. No way……)

text_block_list.name: Funabashi Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Are you serious……? 
But, well……it was a possibility……I guess.

text_block_list.name: Funabashi Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Aaah, I guess it can't be helped. They were from Central…… 
I guess we still held on pretty well……

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
It can't……be helped……? 
It can't……?

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Are you saying that being humiliated 
like this……is only natural!?

text_block_list.name: Funabashi Trainer
text_block_list.text:
W-well yeah, I'm frustrated…… 
I'm frustrated but since Funabashi is weak, it can't be helped……

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: You're wrong! Funabashi is——

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: ……? You're……?
choice_data_list: A Funabashi Trainer! We'll win next time!
A Funabashi Trainer! We'll win next time!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
——!! Right……You're right! 
So you think so too!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
I think it all starts from here! 
I'm an Uma Musume from Funabashi Tracen, Furioso!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Someday……someday! 
We'll beat Central!

After that, we lost track of time talking 
about various things. We really hit it off……

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
An outside race? I'll gladly be your opponent! 
Haaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Haa, haa……Trainer……our hometown club has some 
good girls in it too, huh? I'll ask them if 
they have any interest in Funabashi Tracen.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Thank you for coming to the Funabashi Racecourse today. 
Please take a look at the Funabashi Tracen Academy newsletter!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, this is something important, so I'll ask again. 
Of course I'm really happy, but……

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Are you okay with this? With me. 
Will you form a trainer contract with me and lend me your strength?
choice_data_list: Yeah, I want to support you!
Yeah, I want to support you!

text_block_list.text:
And so, with mutual trust, we formed a contract. 
And then——

text_block_list.name: Host
text_block_list.text:
Now, let's begin Funabashi city's commemorative ceremony. 
Today's guest——

text_block_list.name: Host
text_block_list.text:
Funabashi Tracen's Star of Hope. One of the girls hoping 
to become the next genration's Ace, Furioso-san!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
For inviting me here today, thank you very much. 
For being able to take part in this commemoration 
for the city we love, my Trainer and I are thankful.

Furioso had been working incredibly hard, 
steadily emerging as a rising talent from Funabashi Tracen.

As a representative of Funabashi, there was no doubt she would be 
a force to be reckoned with in the future. After the greeting——

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Pardons! Ooh, so you're Furioso. 
I've been hearing rumors.

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Anticipation! I was finally able to meet you. 
I'm Central Tracen Academy's Chairman, Akikawa.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Eh……!? 
Central Tracen's……Chairman!?

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
(Why is the Boss we need to defeat from Central here……? 
The Nakayama racecourse is in Funabashi……is that why?)

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Furioso, I've wanted to have a serious conversation with you 
at least once. And I'm moved by the opportunity! As such——

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Announcement! I would like to offer a transfer from Funabashi to 
Central. Would you be willing to come to our Tracen Academy?

The offer had come directly from Chairman Akikawa herself, 
who had come all the way to Funabashi. However——

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: I will refuse!

We were told that she wanted a formal response so we visited Central 
Tracen Academy. And there, Furioso gave her unwavering response.

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
I-I see…… 
I guess you really wouldn't just simply accept……

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Of course not! We're aiming to defeat Central, so we came. 
Leaving Funabashi to transfer to Central is……something I can't do!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Fumu, I would like to respect that feeling. 
In that case, my next idea——

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
How about this? Staying in Funabashi 
but attending Central Tracen Academy——

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
A special exchange! This is my suggestion. 
How about it?

I'd heard that such a system existed. Remaining a local racer while 
studying at Central Tracen Academy, it was a dream-like offer……

If she were to accept, 
this would be incredibly beneficial for Furioso, but……

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: I refuse——!!
choice_data_list: Wait! Let's take a look first!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: ……Trainer? After looking first?

It would be better to think about it after taking a look at 
the facilities here. That was my conclusion as a trainer.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Central's facilities……True, I am curious…… 
There's no way I wouldn't be……

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: How are they able to get that strong……
choice_data_list: Then, so we can learn it……!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
I understand. 
We'll take a good look and then think about it.

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Umu, then I shall guide you.
And so, the two of us decided to scout the enemy camp.
